actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of September 5, 1962, to authorize the acquisition of land for the Edison National Historic Site in the State of New Jersey.

summary.text: Revises the authorization for the acquisition of land for the Edison National Historic Site in the State of New Jersey. Authorizes the appropriation of sums not to exceed $75,000 as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of September 5, 1962, to authorize the acquisition of land for the Edison National Historic Site in the State of New Jersey.
